alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison Parish, Warren, western Hinds and southeastern Issaquena Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bolton to near Vicksburg to Somerset. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Afton around 330 PM CDT. Oak Ridge around 350 PM CDT. Eagle Bend, Tendal, Waverly, Omega and Mansford around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mound, Learned, Delta and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
